verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֥חַ <S%H5329><s%> To the chief Musician אַל־ תַּשְׁחֵ֑ת <S%H516><s%> Altaschith מִזְמ֖וֹר <S%H4210><s%> A Psalm לְאָסָ֣ף <S%H623><s%> of Asaph שִֽׁיר׃ <S%H7892><s%> [or] Song ה֘וֹדִ֤ינוּ <S%H3034><s%> do we give thanks לְּךָ֨ ׀ אֱ‍ֽלֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> Unto thee O God ה֭וֹדִינוּ <S%H3034><s%> [unto thee] do we give thanks וְקָר֣וֹב <S%H7138><s%> is near שְׁמֶ֑ךָ <S%H8034><s%> for [that] thy name סִ֝פְּר֗וּ <S%H5608><s%> declare נִפְלְאוֹתֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H6381><s%> thy wondrous works

כִּ֭י <S%H3588><s%> When אֶקַּ֣ח <S%H3947><s%> When I shall receive מוֹעֵ֑ד <S%H4150><s%> the congregation אֲ֝נִ֗י <S%H589><s%> I מֵישָׁרִ֥ים <S%H4339><s%> uprightly אֶשְׁפֹּֽט׃ <S%H8199><s%> I will judge

נְֽמֹגִ֗ים <S%H4127><s%> thereof are dissolved אֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> The earth וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all יֹשְׁבֶ֑יהָ <S%H3427><s%> and all the inhabitants אָנֹכִ֨י <S%H595><s%> is I תִכַּ֖נְתִּי <S%H8505><s%> I bear up עַמּוּדֶ֣יהָ <S%H5982><s%> the pillars סֶּֽלָה׃ <S%H5542><s%> of it Selah

אָמַ֣רְתִּי <S%H559><s%> I said לַֽ֭הוֹלְלִים <S%H1984><s%> unto the fools אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תָּהֹ֑לּוּ <S%H1984><s%> Deal not foolishly וְ֝לָרְשָׁעִ֗ים <S%H7563><s%> and to the wicked אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תָּרִ֥ימוּ <S%H7311><s%> Lift not up קָֽרֶן׃ <S%H7161><s%> the horn

אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תָּרִ֣ימוּ <S%H7311><s%> Lift not up לַמָּר֣וֹם <S%H4791><s%> on high קַרְנְכֶ֑ם <S%H7161><s%> your horn תְּדַבְּר֖וּ <S%H1696><s%> speak בְצַוָּ֣אר <S%H6677><s%> neck עָתָֽק׃ <S%H6277><s%> [not with] a stiff

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> nor מִ֭מּוֹצָא <S%H4161><s%> [cometh] neither from the east וּמִֽמַּעֲרָ֑ב <S%H4628><s%> nor from the west וְ֝לֹ֗א <S%H3808><s%> Nor מִמִּדְבַּ֥ר <S%H4057><s%> nor from the south הָרִֽים׃ <S%H7311><s%> exaltation

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> But אֱלֹהִ֥ים <S%H430><s%> But God שֹׁפֵ֑ט <S%H8199><s%> [is] the judge זֶ֥ה <S%H2088><s%> one יַ֝שְׁפִּ֗יל <S%H8213><s%> he putteth down וְזֶ֣ה <S%H2088><s%> another יָרִֽים׃ <S%H7311><s%> one and setteth up

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> For כ֪וֹס <S%H3563><s%> [there is] a cup בְּֽיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> For in the hand יְהוָ֡ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וְיַ֤יִן <S%H3196><s%> and the wine חָמַ֨ר ׀ <S%H2560><s%> is red מָ֥לֵא <S%H4392><s%> it is full מֶסֶךְ֮ <S%H4538><s%> of mixture וַיַּגֵּ֪ר <S%H5064><s%> and he poureth out מִ֫זֶּ֥ה <S%H2088><s%> of the same אַךְ־ <S%H389><s%> Surely שְׁ֭מָרֶיהָ <S%H8105><s%> but the dregs יִמְצ֣וּ <S%H4680><s%> shall wring [them] out יִשְׁתּ֑וּ <S%H8354><s%> [and] drink כֹּ֝֗ל <S%H3605><s%> all רִשְׁעֵי־ <S%H7563><s%> thereof all the wicked אָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> of the earth

וַ֭אֲנִי <S%H589><s%> I אַגִּ֣יד <S%H5046><s%> But I will declare לְעֹלָ֑ם <S%H5769><s%> for ever אֲ֝זַמְּרָ֗ה <S%H2167><s%> I will sing praises לֵאלֹהֵ֥י <S%H430><s%> to the God יַעֲקֹֽב׃ <S%H3290><s%> of Jacob

וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all קַרְנֵ֣י <S%H7161><s%> All the horns רְשָׁעִ֣ים <S%H7563><s%> of the wicked אֲגַדֵּ֑עַ <S%H1438><s%> also will I cut off תְּ֝רוֹמַ֗מְנָה <S%H7311><s%> shall be exalted קַֽרְנ֥וֹת <S%H7161><s%> [but] the horns צַדִּֽיק׃ <S%H6662><s%> of the righteous
